page.title: 14Stockwood shopping centre.
page.content: The main shopping centre in{Stockwood is to be found in Hollway Road and Stockwood Road. The customers like the Stockwood shops very much because they give quick, personal service. They are convenient, and there is a good variety of shops. For daily purchases the old people in the area (particularly from the old people's home) shop here because the shops are so accessible. Younger people with transport go to other larger shopping areas such as the{Asda Superstore}or the City Centre in{Bristol}or{Bath}for their weekly shopping or major purchases like furniture, clothing, major electrical goods etc. Lots of people are of the opinion that a local superstore would be a great asset to the area of Stockwood.
